price: 27. que mon Seigneur m’a pardonné et m’a placé parmi ceux qui sont honorés ! »
arabic: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bimā ghafara lī rabbī wajaʿalanī mina al-muk'ramīna
